title: Demon Diary, Volume 06
description: You Only Hurt The Demons You LiveWhen Chris was a child, his village was attacked by an insane demon horde. In the siege, the god Rased spared the young boy and buried his memories of the devastation. Chris still carries Rased's power and a hatred of demons -- despite his odd friendship with the cuddliest and most lovable Demon Lord ever, Raenef V! What will it take to make Chris and Raenef duke it out in a no-spells-barred magical melee?
author: Kara
